    radixsort(svec, rev = false)

    radixsort!(svec)

    SortingLab.sort_spointer!
    SortingLab.sorttwo! — Function.
    sorttwo!(vs, index)

    Sort both the vs and reorder index at the same. This allows for faster sortperm for radix sort.

    SortingLab.uint_hist — Function.
    uint_hist(bits, [RADIX_SIZE = 16, RADIX_MASK = 0xffff])

    Computes a histogram (counts) for the vector RADIXSIZE bits at a time. E.g. if eltype(bits) is UInt64 and RADIXSIZE is 16 then 4 histograms are created for each of the 16 bit chunks.
